summary: One measure of the health and readiness of a military aircraft fleet is the mission capable rate—the percentage of total time aircraft can fly and perform at least one mission. We examined whether 46 types of aircraft met their annual mission capable goals for FYs 2011-2019. We found: 3 met their goals in a majority of the years 24 did not meet their goals in...
title: Weapon System Sustainment: Aircraft Mission Capable Rates Generally Did Not Meet Goals and Cost of Sustaining Selected Weapon Systems Varied Widely
